Title: Body Parts
Writer: Pierre Boileau (novel), Thomas Narcejac (novel), Patricia Herskovic (screen story), Joyce Taylor (screen story), Eric Red (screenplay), Norman Snider (screenplay)
Actors: Jeff Fahey, Lindsay Duncan, Kim Delaney, Zakes Mokae
Plot: When Bill Chrashank loses his arm in a car accident, the arm of an executed death row inmate is grafted on in its place. The only problem, as Bill soon discovers, is that the arm is possessed by a force he cannot control.
